entry.title: Kaan Akduman
entry.summary: Hi, I'm Kaan I'm a graduate of Case Western Reserve University with a B.S in Computer Science and a minor in Business Management. I'm working as a Software Developer with Epic. In my free time, I enjoy creating Minecraft plugins, solving word games, and playing…
entry.content: Hi, I'm Kaan I'm a graduate of Case Western Reserve University with a B.S in Computer Science and a minor in Business Management. I'm working as a Software Developer with Epic. In my free time, I enjoy creating Minecraft plugins, solving word games, and playing tennis.
